title: Serve root /favicon.ico and cache-busted PNG favicons

requirements.summary: Serve a valid root favicon at /favicon.ico by adding frontend/public/favicon.ico.
acceptanceCriteria: A file exists at `frontend/public/favicon.ico` in the built app output.
Visiting `/favicon.ico` in the deployed app returns the icon file (HTTP 200) and not a 404.
After a hard refresh, the browser tab no longer shows the default globe favicon due to missing `/favicon.ico`.

file_operations.description: Add a valid ICO favicon at the root public path so browsers requesting `/favicon.ico` receive HTTP 200 and do not fall back to the default globe.
Add the required generated ICO asset `frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-v2.dim_32x32.ico` (transparent background, centered logo) so it is present in the deployed build output.

requirements.summary: Update index.html favicon link declarations to reference only deployed favicon assets including /favicon.ico.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` includes a favicon link to `/favicon.ico` that matches a file actually served by the app.
If `rel="shortcut icon"` is added, it points to `/favicon.ico`.
All favicon `<link>` hrefs in `frontend/index.html` resolve to existing files in the deployed build.

file_operations.description: Ensure favicon `<link>` tags reference only deployed assets; keep `/favicon.ico` and add `rel="shortcut icon"` pointing to `/favicon.ico` for maximum browser compatibility while retaining the cache-busted PNG favicon references.

requirements.summary: Ensure cache-busted PNG favicon assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated matching filenames referenced by index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: Requesting each of these URLs in the deployed app returns HTTP 200: `/assets/generated/favicon-v2-16.dim_16x16.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-v2-32.dim_32x32.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-v2-48.dim_48x48.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-v2-64.dim_64x64.png`.

file_operations.description: Add the cache-busted 16x16 PNG favicon asset so the href used by `frontend/index.html` resolves to a deployed file.
Add the cache-busted 32x32 PNG favicon asset so the href used by `frontend/index.html` resolves to a deployed file.
Add the cache-busted 48x48 PNG favicon asset so the href used by `frontend/index.html` resolves to a deployed file.
Add the cache-busted 64x64 PNG favicon asset so the href used by `frontend/index.html` resolves to a deployed file.
